0.Text: I have a matter to address with you, Lady Scarlet. Normally, I wouldn't come to this decision, but the situation demands it. Your help is requested, as your sister and her maid are absent.

1.Text: One of our gramophones, the Ethereal Resonate, is suddenly missing. I suspect theft, of a musical sort. If my suspicions of the culprits are correct, you'll need this blessed metronome.

2.Text: You must obtain the Resonate before it's used incorrectly, for it is far too dangerous in the hands of the uninformed. Then return to the mansion immediately.
